ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced wind turbine
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a highly efficient wind-powered electrical generator, being a significant improvement to traditional turbines.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced solar generator
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a highly efficient solar electrical generator, capable of extracting significantly more energy from sunlight compared to traditional solar panels.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced watermill generator
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a highly efficient machine that produces electricity from a river. It is capable of extracting significantly more energy compared to a traditional watermill.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced geothermal generator
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a highly efficient machine that can produce large amounts of electricity from geothermal geysers. It is capable of extracting significantly more energy compared to a traditional geothermal generator.
